Text:
I have a question bruss.aka.durka9:
I'm using a previous version of yours, 2.1.1.5 specifically and every time that you update the game i' m just running the updater.Is that right or it's better to download the new torrent every time?
I'm asking that cause your 2.1.1.5 package is more stable by my experience (i had some minor sound problems at some campaigns, just before calling the rescue, at 2.1.18 and crushing problems, every time i finished a campaign in 2.1.1.9!I didn't see anyone else to mention that before, so maybe it's a personal issue, i really don't know...).
Anyway thank you very much for your great work and commitment to the community!!!! :D

to e_t_d_x
Running updater is good choice. )

Hey Bruss, nice torrent, but I have a problem.
Installed it perfectly and updated, but I can't seem to open the console. Help me please?

to Lionboy_91
Impossible. Console enable by default.

This command in game chat (";con_enable 1; bind F8 toggleconsole;) worked to get console up, I tried to play in split screen and the game just shut itself down? Any suggestions on how to play split screen?
Thanks :)

to Lionboy_91
What is split screen?

I got it to work after a few hours of tweaking, what I meant with split screen was like this in the link " http://www.vgblogger.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/07/25/MotorStorm2-SplitScreen.jpg ", 
2 sides on the same display for each player. 
I am playing L4D2, 2 player offline together with a friend on the same computer with 2 xbox 360 controllers.

Thank you for a very great torrent! Now I will enjoy this finally :D

to Lionboy_91
I glad to help you. But I never used such this.

to Mandarin7
Full off antivirus >> run updater >> run game.

The Name Changer aren't working on me

every time i start l4d2 up, it'll say "no permission" if steam is running and "steam is not running. please start steam in order to play this game" when steam is off. and that pops up after the starting cut scene. I've tried run as administrator, but that didn't work. please help.

hen i start the game it always says "need permission" or "steam is not running. start steam in order to play this game"

run as admin doesn't help. please help.

to paul0913
Off antivirus --> run updater --> run Name Changer with administrator privileges --> enjoy.

to wheresmydinner
Off antivirus --> run updater --> off steam --> run game with administrator privileges --> enjoy.

to Nutzu3650XL

to alonso12
You must run game: with admin privileges "Start Menu > Programs > Strogino CS Portal > Left 4 Dead 2 > Left 4 Dead 2" link or with admin privileges on desktop "Left 4 Dead 2" link.

to alonso12
